nodes.text: The NovaSword was an expensive model of starfighter used by some ace pilots serving the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars against the Galactic Republic.
NovaSwords were first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars roleplaying products.

They were originally created for the Star Wars Legends continuity, where the vessels were first indirectly mentioned in the 2004 comic book Obsession 2, before appearing for the first time in the 2005 comic book Obsession 3, both of which were written by W. Haden Blackman and illustrated by Brian Ching. The vessel first received its name in Legends in The Force Unleashed Campaign Guide, a 2008 supplement for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game produced by Wizards of the Coast.
